name: Tile Story
description:
Presentation 

 Tile's Story is the tale of a tile, awaken to fulfill an important matter.

You need to collect energy particles, scattered in the levels.

Then, deliver them to the machine.

 ->  -> 

In order to fulfill this destiny, you'll be able to switch gravity direction.

Beware though, this action requires to carry some energy.

Controls

Supposing the gravity is oriented DOWN:

ActionControlJumpUPMoveLEFT, RIGHTSlowSPACE in the airSwitch gravityLEFT, RIGHT, or UP while slowingLoad machineERestart levelRMute musicMToggle menuX

The controls are shown when available, at the bottom of the screen.

When the gravity changes its direction, the control are all rotated, according to the new direction.

Resources

All the graphical assets has been done with Krita.

The audio has been mixed with FL Studio. 

The guitar has been recorded with a Focusrite interface. 

 The source code and all the resources needed by the game are available in my github repository (see below).
